trans-unit.source: Defines methods for reading the parts of a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> readers for each document in a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> readers, one for each document in a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
Gets a reader for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> with the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
Gets a reader for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> with the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](../Token/TLA%23tla_uri_md.md)].
Gets the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>, if one exists, that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.

For more information about the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] sequence, see chapter 2 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that contains the default printing options for the sequence; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if no print ticket exists for the document.
Gets the thumbnail image, if one exists, that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the sequence.
